application.doc: Exporting a signer certificate from a certificate database

param.name: export
param.doc: An indication that this operation is to retrieve the entire file not just a snippet. This parameter is required

method.name: GET
method.id: Exporting a signer certificate from a certificate database
method.doc: To export a signer certificate from a certificate database with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command with the export parameter on the SSL Certificates signer certificate resource URI. The export parameter is what differentiates the retrieve operation and the export operation. If the export parameter is included in the URL, the signer certificate is exported. If no export parameter is included in the URL, the content of the signer certificate is retrieved.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: Content-Type:application/octet-stream; charset=UTF-8
param.doc: The response is a stream of text.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
